questions.text: How old did Cliff say his mom was going to turn?
questions.explanation:
70.

	Norm told Cliff he needed to spend more than $1.99 on a gift for his mom if he expected to get something good. He ended up paying Carla $3 for a gift her son Anthony made her once.

questions.text: What semi-regular guest star first appeared in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Jackie Swanson.

	Swanson was born in 1963 in Grand Rapids, Michigan. She is also known for her role as Amanda Hunsaker in the movie "Lethal Weapon".

questions.text: When the man was talking about being a clerk, where did Woody say he had been a clerk?
questions.explanation:
Piggly Wiggly.

	Woody did not understand what the man was talking about and thought he met a grocery clerk. The man explained that it was a legal clerk to which Woody replied, "It was all on the up and up."

questions.text: Why did Woody want to fight?
questions.correct: The man told him, "you're not as stupid as you look".
options: The man called him an idiot.
questions.explanation:
The man told him, "you're not as stupid as you look".

	Sam stopped the fight by rambling about a time he broke up another fight. The man told Woody that he'd fight him another time. Woody agreed to meet him at Cheers to fight.

questions.text: How much did Rebecca dock Sam's pay?
questions.explanation:
1 day.

	Sam was giving people hard luck stories so they would give him a bigger tip. Rebecca said that it was unprofessional.

questions.text: Who won the fight between Woody and Nash (Nash is the man he said he would fight earlier in the episode)?
questions.explanation:
Nash.

	Nash was played by Tyrone Power Jr. He was born in 1959, two months after the death of his father. He comes from an acting family.

questions.text: Who did Woody take on a date?
questions.explanation:
Kelly.

	Kelly was played by Jackie Swanson, who was mentioned earlier in this quiz. Kelly was very naive, and very very rich.

questions.text: Why did Woody go out with the girl he took on a date in this episode?
questions.correct: He wanted to make Nash jealous.
options: He had nothing else to do that night.
He was hoping to find a wife.
questions.explanation:
He wanted to make Nash jealous.

	Woody said that Kelly only went out with him to get back at Nash as well. Woody confessed that he really did like Kelly and wanted to see her again.

questions.text: What mode of transportation did Woody use?
questions.explanation:
Bus.

	Nash said to Woody, "You're gonna miss your bus."Woody replied, "A lot you know it doesn't come for another 15 minutes." Nash was trying to insult Woody but Woody was not insulted. He did not seem to care that Nash had more money than him.

questions.text: Where did Woody take the girl on a date?
questions.explanation:
Monster Truck and Tractor Pull.

	Kelly said she had never been to the Monster Truck and Tractor Pull before. Woody thought that Kelly was deprived of a lot of good experiences.
